title: Boney and the Payback Killer
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
genre: Courtroom, Crime, Espionage & Thrillers/Detective and mystery films
subject_group: Crime, Espionage, Justice, Police & Prisons/Criminal investigation
Crime, Espionage, Justice, Police & Prisons/Police - Australia
Crime, Espionage, Justice, Police & Prisons/Crime prevention
abstract: Crime drama series about an Aboriginal policeman in outback Australia, based on the character created by Arthur Upfield.
description: An Aboriginal boxer is released from prison after serving a sentence for killing his tribal brother. He maintains he was innocent and sets out to serve Aboriginal justice on the real killer. Not directly based on a novel. Filmed in Sydney. Season 1, Episode 5, broadcast on Australian television on 07/09/1972.
